snippet.title: Goodnight Universe - Trailer (Playdate)
snippet.description:
Goodnight Universe is a micro audio game to fall asleep with about the heat death of the universe, out now on Playdate.

AVAILABLE ON ITCH https://orangethiefgames.itch.io/goodnight-universe
FOLLOW ORANGE THIEF https://mastodon.social/@OrangeThief

*ABOUT THE GAME*

It is the distant future. The last stars have faded. Everywhere is darkness.

You are adrift.

Send out audible pings and listen for replies. From the time it takes to receive a reply, locate and collect all of the probes.

*PLAY BY SOUND ALONE*

When you can't sleep, light from screens can keep you awake. Unlike other devices the Playdate screen is unlit, perfect for playing undisturbed in the dark when only audio is required.

*OUT NOW*

GAME by Scott Hall https://orkn.uk/

This trailer was created in-engine using Pulp. Enter the cheat code "u u d d l r l r b a" on the game's title screen to play the trailer in-game! 

WEBSITE https://orangethief.co.uk/
CONTACT hello at orangethief.co.uk
